summary: REQ-1 appears implemented: the diff summary indicates a new neon lime green "Site Soundtrack." label was added above the existing YouTube thumbnail links in the Hero section. However, the diff also includes multiple unrelated UI/content changes not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated a "Credentials" section at the very bottom of the app.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to insert a single "Site Soundtrack." label above existing YouTube Music links; it explicitly disallowed redesigning surrounding sections beyond the single label.

hallucinated_features.description: Major redesign/enhancement of the Hero section beyond inserting the label (parallax backgrounds, new typography/layout, "Play Soundtrack" banner styling, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal: do not redesign the surrounding section beyond inserting and styling the single label.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (Hero.tsx description includes multiple visual/typography changes)

hallucinated_features.description: Header navigation and title typography changes (e.g., new Training Videos link; updated header title styling).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; scope was limited to adding a label above YouTube Music links.

hallucinated_features.description: Biography section content/layout changes (education lines expanded; typography and styling changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; scope limited to the soundtrack label.

hallucinated_features.description: Store section content changes (new QR code image and item details formatting).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; scope limited to the soundtrack label.

hallucinated_features.description: Booking/Media/PayPal portal formatting changes (three-line format, Renaissance-styled card references).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; scope limited to the soundtrack label.

hallucinated_features.description: Modifications to the Internet Identity hook implementation/options.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; UI-only request targeting the YouTube Music links section.

hallucinated_features.description: Added project_state.json tracking file with extensive project feature summaries.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of implementing the UI label change.
